metadata.title: CVE-2022-0799 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in Installer in Google Chrome on Windowsprior to 99.0.4844.51 allowed a remote attacker to perform local privilegeescalation via a crafted offline installer file.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
